alert.note: Alert for Arecibo; Barceloneta; Florida; Manati; Vega Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 08 at 3:23PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive runoff from previous rainfall is occurring or expected to begin shortly. * WHERE...Arecibo, Barceloneta, Florida, Manati and Vega Baja. * WHEN...Until 630 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 318 PM AST, Emergency management reported urban flooding due to heavy rain affecting road PR-604 near intersection with highway PR-2 in Manati. The road is partly impassable. Other urban and low-lying areas and area roads may experience flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will aggravate any ongoing flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Arecibo; Barceloneta; Florida; Manati; Vega Baja
